resources.string: Adding account… Select notification within 60s to authorize access.
Sync PasswordSafe databases from cloud services
Can\'t launch Google Drive file. Typically the file has not been synced locally.
App unlinked from Dropbox account. Sync again to allow Dropbox access for PasswdSafe Sync.
Google account authentication required. Sync again to begin the authentication process.
Google account authentication is pending. Select the sign-in request notification.
No sync accounts. Use the menu to add an account.
No ownCloud accounts available. Add an account in the ownCloud app first. Then, it can be selected for PasswdSafe Sync.
App unlinked from OneDrive account. Sync again to allow OneDrive access for PasswdSafe Sync.
Authorization required for access to ownCloud account. Select the pending notification to enable access and then sync the account.
Sync conflict with file %1$s which was locally %2$s and remotely %3$s

2.3.1 - Fix OneDrive sync of files and folders with spaces \n\n 2.3.0 - Add OneDrive support. After authenticating an account, choose the files to sync. \n\n 2.2.0 - Update Dropbox to core API. Files can be synced from any folder. The Apps folder is no longer needed. The app must be reauthorized for access. \n\n 2.1.0 - Add ownCloud support. Accounts are chosen from the list in the ownCloud app. Once access is authorized, password files can be chosen to sync. \n\n 2.0.0 - Improve Google Drive syncing:\n - Improved conflict detection and resolution\n - Show a notification for a sync conflict\n - Include file checksum in remote change detection\n - Improved file deletion detection during a full sync\n - Add additional MIME type for files \n\n 1.6.2 - Update Dropbox sync library \n\n 1.6.1 - Improve Google Drive query performance when performing a full sync. Update Dropbox library. \n\n 1.6.0 - Add German translation \n\n 1.5.0 - Add Box support. Password files (.psafe3) are synced from the top folder and any folder tagged with \'passwdsafe\'. \n\n 1.4.0 - Sync a file\'s folder name. Update the clients for Dropbox and Google to their latest versions. Add some warning messages to help users with Google account authentication. \n\n 1.3.1 - Fix crash when the app is unlinked from the user\'s Dropbox account.
